duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead a team of Regional Business Directors and Pharmaceutical Sales Specialists to drive community sales.
Strategically develop and implement the national community sales plan and cultivate a collaborative culture in the field organization.
Maximize Sales Force Effectiveness by collaborating with relevant stakeholders and aligning execution efforts across customer facing teams.
Select, develop, and manage the Regional Business Directors, community and virtual field sales force, providing coaching and direction for sales strategy development.
Analyze sales and operations data to monitor sales progress and develop corrective plans to improve sales force effectiveness/efficiency.
Create a high-performance culture through empowerment, inclusion, and collaboration, ensuring compliance and ethical promotional standards are met across the sales team.
Stay updated on industry trends, understand market conditions, and develop strategies to address competitive challenges.
Oversee and direct sales force sizing and alignment to support business needs, and prepare monthly, quarterly and annual business updates.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in related discipline is required, MBA preferred.
